message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $120 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I'm still interested in the product, but $160 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $140.
